document.full_text: the hong kong stock exchange has approved glencore's plan to list in the city as part of a $10 billion initial public offering.  prada also applied this week for a listing in hong kong.
document.title: glencore i.p.o. approved in hong kong; prada applies
lines_and_colors: the hong kong stock exchange has approved glencore's plan to list in the city as part of a $10 billion initial public offering.  prada also applied this week for a listing in hong kong.
